CustomField.formula: CASE(PJN_New_Therapy_Status__c, "Cancelled", CASE(PJN_New_Therapy_Sub_Status__c, "Missing Information, Max Attempts","Missing information required to complete enrollment, max attempts to patient, prescriber and/or RBM", "Indication Criteria Not Met","ICD Code, Indication Confirmation or Underaged - not eligible to start", "Requirement Not Met - Patient Residency","Patient does not reside in the United States or territories", "Requirement Not Met - Prescriber License","Prescriber is not licensed to prescribe medication in the United States or territories", "Unable to reach Patient on required contact, Max Attempts","Maximum attempts exhausted for contacting patient", "Unable to reach Prescriber on required contact, Max Attempts","Maximum attempts exhausted for contacting prescriber", "Patient Decision - Alternate Therapy","Patient on alternate treatment therapy", "Patient Decision - Financial","Patient unable to afford out of pocket expense", "Patient Decision - Other","Patient unwilling to started treatment, other", "Prescriber Decision - Alternate Therapy","Patient on alternate treatment therapy", "Prescriber Decision - Financial" ,"Patient unable to afford out of pocket expense", "Prescriber Decision - Coverage Effort","Prescriber not willing to purse treatment due to payor hurdles", "Prescriber Decision - Other","Patient unwilling to started treatment, other", "Patient Medical Delay, Max Delay","Hospitalization, LTC, and other medical reason a patient could not start treatment", "No Route of Access","Appeal options exhausted and over criteria for PAP", "Patient Deceased","Patient deceased", "Other","Other", "Clinical Trial","Patient is entering a clinical trial for a different medication", "No coverage: Appeals exhausted and PAP ineligible","Replaces No Route of Access sub status - Appeal options exhausted and over income criteria for PAP", "Patient does not want infusion","Patient does not want infusion", "Administration Barrier","Could not locate vein access to infuse patient", null), null)
CustomField.label: Status Description - Cancelled
